text:
Is there a tutorial for BioJulia? I want to see how much from the bioinformatics class I'm taking that I can do in it.

My first thought was "Can I ask it to load one or more GenBank sequences?" But I'm not seeing anything, not even sure which package it would be in.

I'd be happy to document my exploration and compile a tutorial based on it.

elements.text:
Is there a tutorial for BioJulia? I want to see how much from the bioinformatics class I'm taking that I can do in it.

My first thought was "Can I ask it to load one or more GenBank sequences?" But I'm not seeing anything, not even sure which package it would be in.

I'd be happy to document my exploration and compile a tutorial based on it.

text:
That would be helpful! There's a genbank parser made by someone, but it's not in biojulia. Building one is one of the oldest items on my julia to-do list :man-facepalming:

We've had discussions in the past about making a biojulia cookbook, but people have been too busy developing to get that set up
